languages.text: Has a melee chainsword attack as well as flamer attacks. Melee attacks benefit from chain weapon +25% crit damage and can be used to parry.

traits.locale_text: Has a melee chainsword attack as well as flamer attacks. Melee attacks benefit from chain weapon +25% crit damage and can be used to parry.

languages.text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.
languages.original_text: Огнемет, совмещенный с цепным оружием. Такая модификация позволяет {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаки. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Критический урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на 25%.

traits.locale_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a melee chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can parry with this weapon and has melee critical damage increased by +25%.

A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

languages.text: Alevsaçan ile {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} motorlu silahının birleşimi. Kullanan kişi, bu yakın dövüş özelliği sayesinde silahla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapabilir. Verdiği yakın dövüş {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasarı{/g} da +%25 artar.
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Alevsaçan ile yakın dövüş motorlu silahının birleşimi. Kullanan kişi, bu yakın dövüş özelliği sayesinde silahla savuşturma yapabilir. Verdiği yakın dövüş kritik hasarı da +%25 artar.

Alevsaçan ile yakın dövüş motorlu silahının birleşimi. Kullanan kişi, bu yakın dövüş özelliği sayesinde silahla savuşturma yapabilir. Verdiği yakın dövüş {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasarı{/g} da +%25 artar.

languages.text: Una combinación de lanzallamas y arma sierra {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}; debido a lo segundo, el portador puede realizar {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}paradas{/g} con ella. También aumenta en un +25 % su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} en cuerpo a cuerpo.
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Una combinación de lanzallamas y arma sierra cuerpo a cuerpo; debido a lo segundo, el portador puede realizar paradas con ella. También aumenta en un +25 % su daño crítico en cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text: 火焰喷射器与{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}链锯武器的混合体。由于可以当做链锯武器使用，这把武器可以用来{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，近战攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}也提高25%。
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: 火焰喷射器与近战链锯武器的混合体。由于可以当做链锯武器使用，这把武器可以用来格挡，近战攻击造成的暴击伤害也提高25%。

languages.text: Ce lance-flammes est doté d'une arme tronçonneuse de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} qui permet à l'utilisateur de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} en mêlée augmentent également de +25 %.
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Ce lance-flammes est doté d'une arme tronçonneuse de mêlée qui permet à l'utilisateur de parer. Ses dégâts critiques en mêlée augmentent également de +25 %.

languages.text: フレイマーと{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}チェーン武器のハイブリッド。後者のおかげで、使用者はこの武器で{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}できる。その近接{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}も+25%増加する。
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: フレイマーと近接チェーン武器のハイブリッド。後者のおかげで、使用者はこの武器で受け流しできる。その近接クリティカルダメージも+25%増加する。
フレイマーと近接チェーン武器のハイブリッド。後者のおかげで、使用者はこの武器で受け流しできる。その近接クリティカルダメージも+25%増加する。

languages.text: Eine Kombination aus Flammenwerfer und {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Kettenwaffe. Dank Letzterer kann der Träger mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Sein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Nahkampfschaden{/g} erhöht sich auf +25 %.
languages.original_text: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Eine Kombination aus Flammenwerfer und Nahkampf-Kettenwaffe. Dank Letzterer kann der Träger mit dieser Waffe parieren. Sein kritischer Nahkampfschaden erhöht sich auf +25 %.

languages.text: Огнемет, совмещенный с цепным оружием. Такая модификация позволяет {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаки. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Критический урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на 25%.

Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.
